programme.title: The Walking Dead S5 Ep04
programme.desc: Beth wakes in a hospital and meets a new band of survivors but what looks good on the surface may hide a bit of a dark side.

programme.title: The Walking Dead S5 Ep05
programme.desc: New issues confront Abraham's group while on a mission. Can they push through and survive these challenges or better yet, each other?

programme.title: The Walking Dead S5 Ep06
programme.desc: As Daryl and Carol try to rescue the kidnapped Beth, a lucky encounter points them at the right direction.

programme.title: Elementary S6 Ep01
programme.desc: Holmes confronts a medical diagnosis that threatens both his career and sobriety.

programme.title: Elementary S6 Ep02
programme.desc: Watson and her half sister, Lin, have conflicting reactions when their estranged biological father dies.

programme.title: Lego Masters UK S2 Ep06
programme.desc: 6 of our most talented junior builders from Series 1 and Series 2 paired up with 6 celebrity helpers who share their passion for the little plastic brick.

programme.title: The Cube Australia Ep10
programme.desc: Sisters Michelle and Sam are back. Tonight Sam is pushed to her limits as her skills of speed and accuracy are put to the test in the game Selection.

programme.title: S.W.A.T. S3 Ep20
programme.desc: The SWAT team pursues a couple reminiscent of Bonnie and Clyde, when the duo goes on the run and on the hunt for a set of rare chest pieces worth millions.

programme.title: NCIS S17 Ep16
programme.desc: While investigating the suicide of a Navy officer who left a rare coin, the team imagines themselves in his life story in order to piece together how the coin ended up in his possession.

programme.title: FBI: Most Wanted S1 Ep14
programme.desc: When a father and son bank robbing duo escape from a prison, the team must hunt them down before they steal enough money to escape the country.

programme.title: Magnum P.I. S1 Ep19
programme.desc: When Magnum and Higgins get yacht-jacked, Higgins is shot and she and Magnum are stranded at sea, struggling to reach land before she bleeds out and the culprits return to finish them off.

programme.title: The Karate Kid: Part II
programme.desc: Daniel accompanies his mentor Mr. Miyagi to Okinawa. Miyagi visits his dying father and confronts his old rival, while Daniel falls in love and inadvertently makes a new rival of his own.

programme.title: Thrill Ride
programme.desc: 3 kids sneak into an amusement park after hearing rumors that an infamous gangster once buried treasure there. The attractions come alive, and they must enlist the help of a witch to survive

programme.title: The Little Vampire
programme.desc: Rudolph is a thirteen year old vampire whose clan is threatened by a notorious vampire hunter.

programme.title: Class Rank
programme.desc: Two high school outsiders join forces to overtake the local school board. Guided by their families, they enter the world of politics and, in the process, learn a thing or two about love.

programme.title: Monster Trucks
programme.desc: A young man working at a small town junkyard discovers and befriends a creature which feeds on oil being sought by a fracking company.

programme.title: Jem and the Holograms
programme.desc: As a small-town girl catapults from underground video sensation to global superstar, she and her three sisters discover that some talents are too special to keep hidden.

programme.title: Galaxy Quest
programme.desc: The alumni cast of a cult space TV show have to play their roles as the real thing when an alien race needs their help.

programme.title: A Boy Called Po
programme.desc: After his wife dies of cancer, an overworked engineer struggles to care for his son with autism. His son in response to bullying regresses into a fantasy world escape.

programme.title: Sinbad: Legend of the Seven Seas
programme.desc: A legendary sailor is framed by a goddess for theft, and must travel to another realm to retrieve something and save the life of his childhood friend.

programme.title: Trouble
programme.desc: A pampered dog named Trouble must learn to live in the real world, while trying to escape from his former owner's greedy children.

programme.title: Four Kids and it
programme.desc: A group of kids on holiday in Cornwall meet a magical creature on the beach with the power to grant wishes

programme.title: Terra Willy: Unexplored Planet
programme.desc: Following the destruction of their ship, young Willy is separated from his parents with whom he traveled through space. His rescue capsule lands on a wild and unexplored planet.

programme.title: Mr. Peabody & Sherman
programme.desc: An advanced canine and his adopted human son must travel through time to fix a big mistake

programme.title: Zookeeper
programme.desc: When zookeeper Griffin considers leaving, his beloved animals decide to break their time-honored code of silence and help their kindhearted caretaker out, animal style.

By 2067, Earth has been ravaged by climate change and humanity is forced to live on artificial oxygen, an underground tunnel worker is sent to the future to save the human race.

programme.title: The 2nd
programme.desc: Secret-service agent Vic Davis finds himself in the middle of a high-stakes terrorist operation when he is on his way to pick up his estranged son.

programme.title: Little Monsters
programme.desc: A washed-up musician teams up with a teacher and a kids show personality to protect young children from a sudden outbreak of zombies.

programme.title: Scary Stories to Tell in the Dark
programme.desc: On Halloween 1968, reclusive Stella and her two friends meet a mysterious drifter, Ramn, and uncover a sinister notebook of stories.

programme.title: Pixels
programme.desc: When aliens misinterpret video feeds of classic arcade games as a declaration of war, they attack the Earth in the form of the video games.

programme.title: Jexi
programme.desc: A comedy about what can happen when you love your phone more than anything else in your life.

programme.title: Daddy's Home 2
programme.desc: Having finally gotten used to each other's existence, Brad and Dusty must now deal with their intrusive fathers during the holidays.

programme.title: Military Wives
programme.desc: With their partners away serving in Afghanistan, a group of women on the home front form a choir and quickly find themselves at the center of a media sensation and global movement.

programme.title: Valley Girl
programme.desc: Set to a new wave '80s soundtrack, a pair of young lovers from different backgrounds defy their parents and friends to stay together. A musical adaptation of the 1983 film.

programme.title: Blithe Spirit
programme.desc: A spiritualist medium holds a seance for a writer suffering from writer's block but accidentally summons the spirit of his deceased first wife, which leads to an increasingly complex love triangle.

programme.title: 10 Minutes Gone
programme.desc: Crime boss Rex hires Frank and his crew to steal a priceless jewel stash but the job goes wrong when someone tips off the cops.

programme.title: Stowaway
programme.desc: A three-person crew on a mission to Mars faces an impossible choice when an unplanned passenger jeopardizes the lives of everyone on board.

programme.title: Jack Ryan: Shadow Recruit
programme.desc: When CIA agent Jack Ryan believes he's uncovered a Russian plot to collapse the United States economy, he goes from being an analyst to becoming a spy.

programme.title: The Vow
programme.desc: A car accident puts Paige in a coma, and when she wakes up with severe memory loss, her husband Leo works to win her heart again.
